title: Login issue
description: Customer cannot log in despite correct credentials and multiple password reset attempts.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Payment fails with credit card, even after using multiple cards and methods.

title: Page not loading
description: Dashboard page takes too long to load, causing delays across devices and browsers.

title: Email not received
description: Customer verification emails not received, preventing account activation and login.

title: Mobile app crash
description: App crashes when opening Profile, even after reinstalling and clearing cache.

title: Refund not processed
description: Customer refund not reflected in account despite multiple requests to support.

title: Error 500 on checkout
description: Server returns Error 500 during checkout, preventing completion of purchases.

title: UI glitch
description: Buttons overlap on small screens, making navigation difficult for users.

title: Slow search results
description: Search takes too long, over ten seconds, affecting productivity on all devices.

title: Forgot password not working
description: Password reset emails are not sent, preventing users from accessing accounts.
